content.raw:
Hi, recently I have discovered problem with resolving host "api.ignitionfuel.org" during gazebo startup. I have tried reinstall gazebo even os. Still same error.

Can anybody help me with this?

**OS:** Ubuntu 18.10

**gazebo output here:**

```
#!shell

$ gazebo --verbose
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.106
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.106
[Wrn] [Event.cc:61] Warning: Deleting a connection right after creation. Make sure to save the ConnectionPtr from a Connect call
[Err] [REST.cc:205] Error in REST request

libcurl: (6) Could not resolve host: api.ignitionfuel.org
```
content.html:
Hi, recently I have discovered problem with resolving host "api.ignitionfuel.org" during gazebo startup. I have tried reinstall gazebo even os. Still same error.

Can anybody help me with this?

OS: Ubuntu 18.10

gazebo output here:

$ gazebo --verbose
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345

[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.106
[Wrn] [Event.cc:61] Warning: Deleting a connection right after creation. Make sure to save the ConnectionPtr from a Connect call
[Err] [REST.cc:205] Error in REST request

libcurl: (6) Could not resolve host: api.ignitionfuel.org
